SELECT C.ID, C.NICKNAME, M.PROFILE, C.COMMUNITY_COMMENT_NO, C.COMMUNITY_COMMENT, C.NOTICE_CATEGORY, C.NOTICE_NO FROM projectdb.COMMUNITY_COMMENT AS C INNER JOIN projectdb.MEMBER AS M ON C.ID = M.ID WHERE C.NOTICE_CATEGORY = #{comment.noticeCategory} AND C.NOTICE_NO = #{comment.noticeNo}
ORDER BY C.COMMUNITY_COMMENT_NO ASC;
